getting-started/accessing-neurond.title: Accessing Neurond Assistant
getting-started/accessing-neurond.description: This page explains how to access Neurond Assistant for the first time and what you need to get started.

getting-started/dashboard-overview.title: Dashboard Overview
getting-started/dashboard-overview.description: After logging in, you'll see the Neurond Assistant Dashboard - your main workspace. This guide explains each part of the interface so you can navigate confidently.

getting-started/logging-in.title: Logging In
getting-started/logging-in.description: This guide walks you through the complete login process for Neurond Assistant, from your first login to understanding your user dashboard.

getting-started/logging-out.title: Logging Out
getting-started/logging-out.description: This guide explains how to safely log out of Neurond Assistant to protect your account and data.

introduction/index.title: What is Neurond Assistant?
introduction/index.description: Welcome to the Neurond Assistant User Manual. This guide will help you understand and use Neurond Assistant effectively in your daily work.

introduction/key-features.title: Key Features Overview
introduction/key-features.description: This page provides an overview of the main features available in Neurond Assistant. Each feature is explained in simple terms with practical examples.

introduction/who-should-use.title: Who Should Use Neurond Assistant?
introduction/who-should-use.description: Neurond Assistant is designed for everyone in your organization. This page helps you understand how different roles can benefit from using NA.

system-setup/deployment-troubleshooting.description: Common deployment issues and their solutions.

system-setup/environment-variables.title: Environment Variables
system-setup/environment-variables.description: Understanding and managing environment variables for Neurond Assistant.

system-setup/overview.title: System Setup Overview
system-setup/overview.description: High-level overview of deploying and maintaining Neurond Assistant.

system-setup/prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
system-setup/prerequisites.description: What you need before deploying Neurond Assistant.

system-setup/rollback.title: Rollback Procedures
system-setup/rollback.description: How to rollback to a previous version if something goes wrong.

system-setup/updating-deployment.title: Updating and Redeploying
system-setup/updating-deployment.description: How to update Neurond Assistant and redeploy changes.

system-setup/vercel-deployment.title: Vercel Deployment Guide
system-setup/vercel-deployment.description: Complete step-by-step guide to deploy Neurond Assistant on Vercel.

troubleshooting/common-issues.title: Common Issues and Solutions
troubleshooting/common-issues.description: Quick solutions to frequently encountered problems.

troubleshooting/error-messages.title: Error Messages Explained
troubleshooting/error-messages.description: Common error messages and what they mean in plain language.

troubleshooting/faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
troubleshooting/faq.description: Answers to commonly asked questions about Neurond Assistant.

troubleshooting/performance-issues.title: Performance Issues
troubleshooting/performance-issues.description: Troubleshoot slow response times and performance problems.

troubleshooting/when-to-contact-support.title: When to Contact Support
troubleshooting/when-to-contact-support.description: Know when to troubleshoot yourself vs. when to contact IT support.

user-guide/asking-questions.title: Asking Questions Effectively
user-guide/asking-questions.description: Learn how to phrase questions to get the best answers from Neurond Assistant.

user-guide/common-errors.title: Common User Errors and Fixes
user-guide/common-errors.description: Quick solutions to common issues users encounter while using Neurond Assistant.

user-guide/content-drafting.title: Content Drafting
user-guide/content-drafting.description: Use Neurond Assistant to draft emails, reports, summaries, and other business communications.

user-guide/conversation-history.title: Conversation History
user-guide/conversation-history.description: Access, manage, and continue your past conversations with Neurond Assistant.

user-guide/document-processing.title: Document Processing
user-guide/document-processing.description: Process invoices, forms, receipts, and other documents to extract structured data.

user-guide/exporting-results.title: Exporting Results
user-guide/exporting-results.description: Save and export outputs from Neurond Assistant for use in other applications.

user-guide/knowledge-retrieval.title: Knowledge Retrieval
user-guide/knowledge-retrieval.description: Use Neurond Assistant to search and find information from your company's knowledge base.

user-guide/uploading-documents.title: Uploading Documents
user-guide/uploading-documents.description: Learn how to upload files to Neurond Assistant for processing, analysis, and extraction.

user-guide/using-chat-interface.title: Using the Chat Interface
user-guide/using-chat-interface.description: The chat interface is the main way you interact with Neurond Assistant. This guide teaches you how to use it effectively.

user-manual/chat-ui.title: Chat Interface Guide
user-manual/chat-ui.description: The Chat Interface is where you interact directly with Neurond Assistant to ask questions, analyze documents, and perform various tasks.

user-manual/collection.title: Collection Management Guide
user-manual/collection.description: Collections in Neurond Assistant serve as a structured library for your documents, images, and other resources. This guide walks you through every detail of managing your centralized knowledge base.

user-manual/image-studio.title: Image Studio Guide
user-manual/image-studio.description: Image Studio allows you to create artistic images or edit existing ones using artificial intelligence.

user-manual/login.title: Login Guide
user-manual/login.description: This guide walks you through the process of accessing and logging into Neurond Assistant.

user-manual/prompt-gallery.title: Prompt Gallery Guide
user-manual/prompt-gallery.description: The Prompt Gallery is a powerful tool for managing and discovering AI prompts. It allows you to save your own creative prompts or use community-wide "Global" prompts to enhance your interaction with Neurond Assistant.

user-manual/workspace.title: Workspace Creation Guide
user-manual/workspace.description: Workspaces are the core of your productivity with Neurond Assistant. They serve as specialized environments where you can configure specific AI behaviors, models, and data sources. This guide walks you through every detail of the creation process.
